name: 3rd Person Shooter Prototype
description:
A 3rd person shooter with 2 gun mechanics to choose from.
Which version will get developed further?
Your feedback affects the direction of development!
Play both versions, then submit a response to this survey to make your opinion heard:
https://forms.gle/fyV77y3xbCBomZBt8

Prototype "Dual Source"

Left and right weapons build up Heat. When Heat reaches max you overheat and can't use 'em until you cool off. Heat disperses on its own, faster if you use your Special weapon.

Special weapon uses energy. 
Energy regenerates slowly. Pick up Energy Cubes from fallen enemies for a boost!

Prototype "Power Slider"

Using Left weapon drains Left energy and increases Right energy and vice versa.

The higher the Energy the stronger the attack.
Hit enemies to build up energy for special attack!

Controls

C - Toggle between controller and mouse and keyboard

Keyboard and mouse

  • Move - WASD
  • Aim - Mouse look
  • Dash - Space
  • Left weapon - Left mouse click
  • Right weapon - Right mouse click
  • Special Weapon - Left Shift
  • Interact - F
  • Menu - Tab
    Hit confirm twice to exit

Gamepad 

  • Move - Left stick
  • Aim - Right stick
  • Dash - Right Bumper
  • Left weapon - Left trigger
  • Right weapon - Right trigger
  • Special Weapon - Left bumper
  • Interact - X button
